title: As a User, I want to see a 40-Man Flag Added to the Social Media Consent Report
custom_steps:
Report Details:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Social+Media+Consent+Report+-+Report+Detail

AC:
 - There will be a new 40-Man flag added to the view for the Social Media Consent Report
 - There will be a new 40-Man column added to the Social Media Consent Report
 - If the player is currently on the 40-Man Roster, "Yes" will be displayed
 - If the player is not currently on the 40-Man Roster, "No" will be displayed

title: As a Receiving Club User, I want to Receive an Email every 24 hours if I have not Approved or Denied an Employee Permission Request
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an employee permission request has been submitted
AND the request has NOT been approved or denied
AND a batch has been created to send notifications
custom_expected:
THEN all users entered as Current Club Contacts on the Request, as well as the designated employee negotiator (#166744924), should receive an email notification 
AND the batch should run and generate the notifications every day at 11:00 AM
AND the email should show:
**Subject:** New Employee Permission Request
**Content:** A new employee permission requests has been submitted for [Employee First] [Employee Last]. Please log into EBIS to review.
AND the email should contain a link to the Permission Request
AND the reminder emails should continue until the request is approved, denied, or expires

title: As an Inquiring User, I want to Receive an Email if an Employee Permission Request I Submitted is Denied
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has submitted an Employee Permission Request
custom_steps: WHEN the Employee Permission Request is denied
custom_expected:
THEN the Inquiring Club Contact user should receive an email notification:
AND email should show:
**Subject:** Employee Permission Request Denied
**Content:** The employee permission request submitted for [Employee First] [Employee Last] has been denied. Please log into EBIS to review
AND the email should contain a link to the Permission Request

title: As an Inquiring Club User, I want to Receive an Email if an Employee Permission Request I Submitted is Approved
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has submitted an employee permission request
custom_steps: WHEN the Employee Permission Request is approved
custom_expected:
THEN the Inquiring Club Contact user, should receive an email notification
AND the email should show:
**Subject:** Employee Permission Request Approved
**Content:** The employee permission request submitted for [Employee First] [Employee Last] has been approved. Please log into EBIS to review.
AND the email should contain a link to the Permission Request

title: As a Receiving Club User, I want to Receive an Email if a Resolution is entered on an Employee Permission Request
custom_preconds: GIVEN an active Employee Permission Request exists
custom_steps: WHEN a resolution is entered on the Employee Permission Request
custom_expected:
THEN all users entered as Current Club Contacts on the Request, as well as the designated employee negotiator (#166744924), should receive an email notification
AND the email should show:
**Subject:** Resolution Entered on Employee Permission Request
**Content:** A resolution has been entered on the employee permission request submitted for [Employee First] [Employee Last]. Please log into EBIS to review.
AND the email should contain a link to the Permission Request

title: As a Receiving Club User, I want to Receive an Email if an Extension is Requested on an Employee Permission Request
custom_preconds: GIVEN an Active Employee Permission Request exists
custom_steps: WHEN an extension is requested on the Employee Permission Request
custom_expected:
THEN all users entered as Current Club Contacts on the Request, as well as the designated employee negotiator (#166744924), should receive an email notification
AND the email should show:
**Subject:** Extension Requested on Employee Permission Request
**Content:** An extension has been requested on the employee permission request submitted for [Employee First] [Employee Last]. Please log into EBIS to review.
AND the email should contain a link to the Permission Request

title: As an Inquiring User, I want to Receive an Email if an Extension Request on an Employee Permission Request I Submitted is Denied
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an active Employee Permission Request exists
AND an extension has been requested for it
custom_steps: WHEN the Extension Request is denied
custom_expected:
THEN the Inquiring Club Contact user should receive an email notification:
AND the email should show:
**Subject:** Employee Permission Extension Request Denied
**Content:** **Content:** The extension for [Employee First] [Employee Last]'s employee permission request has been approved.  Please log into EBIS to review.
AND the email should contain a link to the Permission Request

title: As an Inquiring Club User, I want to Receive an Email if an Extension Request on an Employee Permission Request I Submitted is Approved
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an active Employee Permission Request exists
AND an extension has been requested for it
custom_steps: WHEN the Extension Request is approved
custom_expected:
THEN the Inquiring Club Contact user should receive an email notification:
AND the email should show:
**Subject:** Employee Permission Extension Request Approved
**Content:** The extension for [Employee First] [Employee Last]'s employee permission request has been approved.  Please log into EBIS to review.
AND the email should contain a link to the Permission Request

title: As a Receiving Club User, I want to Receive an Email if a Post Extension Resolution is entered on an Employee Permission Request
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an active Employee Permission Request exists
AND an extension has been requested and granted for it
custom_steps: WHEN the post extension resolution is entered
custom_expected:
THEN all users entered as Current Club Contacts on the Request, as well as the designated employee negotiator (#166744924), will receive an email notification
AND email should show:
**Subject:** Post Extension Resolution Entered on Employee Permission Request
**Content:** A post extension resolution has been entered on the employee permission request submitted for [Employee First] [Employee Last]. Please log into EBIS to review.
AND the email should contain a link to the Permission Request

title: As a Club User, I want to Receive an Email the day before the expiration of an Employee Permission Request
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an approved Employee Permission Request exists
AND a batch has been created to generate email notifications
AND current date is the day before the expiration date of the Employee Permission Request
custom_steps: WHEN the batch runs at 11:00 AM on the day prior to the expiration of an Employee Permission Request
custom_expected:
THEN the Inquiring Club Contact User, as well as all users entered as Current(receiving) Club Contacts on the Request and the designated employee negotiator, should receive an email notification
AND email should show:
**Subject:** Employee Permission Request Expiring Soon
**Content:** The employee permission request submitted for [Employee First] [Employee Last] is set to expire on [End Date] at [End Time]. Please log into EBIS to review.
AND the email should contain a link to the Permission Request

title: As a Club User, I want to Receive an Email the day before the expiration of an Extension Period on an Employee Permission Request
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an approved Employee Permission Request exists
AND an Extension request has been approved for it
AND a batch has been created to generate email notifications
AND current date is the day before the Extension Period Expiration on the request
custom_steps: WHEN the batch runs at 11:00 AM
custom_expected:
THEN the Inquiring Club Contact User, as well as all users entered as Current(receiving) Club Contacts on the Request and the designated employee negotiator should receive an email notification:
AND email should show:
**Subject:** Employee Permission Request Expiring Soon
**Content:** The extension period on the employee permission request submitted for [Employee First] [Employee Last] is set to expire on [Extension End Date] at [Extensions End Time]. Please log into EBIS to review.
AND the email should contain a link to the Permission Request

title: As a New WLP User, I want the Login Screen to have a link to Self Reg on Inside MLB
custom_steps:
AC:
 - On the login screen for the Winter League Portal (https://winterleagues.mlb.com/), there is a "Sign Up" link
 - The "Sign Up" link should direct users to this URL:
https://inside.mlb.com/UserRegistrationForm/?GROUP=WinterLeagues
